ExampleDefinition.Title: Bind SciChart to Data
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use MVVM to databind SciChart to a DataSeriesSet. This example uses a single line chart, with View and ViewModel and shows how to bind SciChart to a data-source and append new data using the MVVM pattern.
